5ef052e1-152e-48de-ad2c-a9cdd77d797e.description: Badge earner produced an exceptional, professional video related to their academic activities that the Community Education and Training Department of Mercer County Community College deemed worthy to post to their YouTube channel. The video creatively reflects the research, initiative, technological and career skills that the individual has mastered.
5ef052e1-152e-48de-ad2c-a9cdd77d797e.name: CET Video Honors (1st Award)

issuer.summary: issued by Mercer County Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Produce a video in response to a course assignment that creatively reflects acquiring a mastery of research, initiative, technological and career skills worthy of inclusion in the MCCC CET YouTube site.

Attend the High School Equivalency (HSE), Adult Basic Equivalency (ABE) or other similar course at the Community Education and Training Department at the JKC Campus of Mercer County Community College.
Present your summative project to the course members and faculty for review and assessment.
Participate in individual and group activities surrounding this summative project including the critique of others' presentations.

f54dd7b2-75d1-4b64-ac29-b5c7216ca5da.description: Demonstrates a typing proficiency of at least 20 words per minute with an accuracy of 96% or better.
f54dd7b2-75d1-4b64-ac29-b5c7216ca5da.name: CET Typing - 20 WPM

issuer.summary: issued by Mercer County Community College

badge_template_activities.title: Three 5-minute proctored tests demonstrating a typing speed of at least 20 words per minute with a 96% or higher accuracy.
Requires at least ten digital check-ins or five hours of typing lessons/instruction.

Attend the High School Equivalency (HSE), Adult Basic Equivalency (ABE) or other similar course at the Community Education and Training Department at the JKC Campus of Mercer County Community College.
